import React from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form,FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {sprice, reviews} = tour return

${sprice} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
} export default Booking
